claimPrestigeReward(uint256,bytes).details: Reclama la recompensa de prestigio. Requiere una firma válida del backend para evitar trampas.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "No hay suficiente ganancia para prestigio"

arguments.value: No hay suficiente ganancia para prestigio

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "No hay suficiente ganancia para prestigio"

documentation.text:
@dev Reclama la recompensa de prestigio.
 Requiere una firma válida del backend para evitar trampas.

@title GameManager
 @dev Contrato que gestiona la lógica de prestigio y acuña recompensas.
